greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1 - x) / (1 - x - x^3) in powers of x.
comment: Number of compositions of n into parts >= 3. - _Milan Janjic_, Jun 28 2010
Number of compositions of number n into parts of the form 3*k+1, k >= 0.
For example, a(10)=19 and all compositions of 10 in parts 1,4,7 or 10 are

a(n+1) is for n >= 0 the number of 00's in the Narayana word NW(n); equivalently the number of two neighboring 0's at level n of the Narayana tree. See A257234. This implies that if a(0) is put to 0 then a(n) is the number of -1's in the Narayana word NW(n), and also at level n of the Narayana tree. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 24 2015
reference: Taylor L. Booth, Sequential Machines and Automata Theory, John Wiley and Sons, Inc., 1967, page 331ff.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Christian Ballot, On Functions Expressible as Words on a Pair of Beatty Sequences, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 20 (2017), Article 17.4.2.
C. K. Fan, Structure of a Hecke algebra quotient, J. Amer. Math. Soc. 10 (1997), no. 1, 139-167. [Page 156, f_n.]
Taras Goy, On identities with multinomial coefficients for Fibonacci-Narayana sequence, Annales Mathematicae et Informaticae, Vol. 49 (2018), 75-84.
J. D. Opdyke, A unified approach to algorithms generating unrestricted.., J. Math. Model. Algor. 9 (2010) 53-97.
Yüksel Soykan, Summing Formulas For Generalized Tribonacci Numbers, arXiv:1910.03490 [math.GM], 2019.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-3) for n >= 4. - _Jaroslav Krizek_, May 07 2011
G.f.: Q(0)*(1-x)/2, where Q(k) = 1 + 1/(1 - x*(4*k+1 + x^2)/( x*(4*k+3 + x^2) + 1/Q(k+1) )); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Sep 08 2013
maple: A078012 := proc(n): if n=0 then 1 else add(binomial(n-3-2*i,i),i=0..(n-3)/3) fi: end: seq(A078012(n), n=0..46); # _Johannes W. Meijer_, Aug 11 2011
mathematica: CoefficientList[ Series[(1-x)/(1-x-x^3), {x,0,50}], x] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 25 2011 *)
a[ n_]:= If[ n >= 0, SeriesCoefficient[ (1-x)/(1-x-x^3), {x, 0, n}], SeriesCoefficient[1/(1+x^2-x^3), {x, 0, -n}]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Feb 03 2018 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, n = -n; polcoeff( 1 / (1 + x^2 - x^3) + x * O(x^n), n), polcoeff( (1 - x) / (1 - x - x^3) + x * O(x^n), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, May 03 2011 */
(MAGMA) I:=[1,0,0]; [n le 3 select I[n] else Self(n-1) + Self(n-3): n in [1..50]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 19 2018
(GAP) a:=[1,0,0];; for n in [4..50] do a[n]:=a[n-1]+a[n-3]; od; a; # _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 28 2019
